chapters.title: Chapter 11: Tar Valon
chapters.info: Theodrin Dabei, p. 155 (120)—Accepted with a willowy neck and coppery skin. She moves gracefully. She was a wilder, one who learned to channel by herself before coming to the Tower. Like Nynaeve, Theodrin had a block that inhibited her channelling for a time. She learned how to knock hers down, and plans to help Nynaeve do the same.
